Posts.Content: There seems to be some confusion happening here. I've just read the Macmillan website. Secondary cancer is not cancer that has spread to the lymph nodes but cancer that has spread to one of the main organs , liver, lungs or bones. I had a mastectomy and  lymph node clearance ( cancer was in two of my nodes). I was certainly not told that I had secondary breast cancer!  Lucyx
Posts.Title: 120mm tumour
